text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Akar Aghuir kɨ kurim kamaghɨn mɨgei, God gumazamiziba bar men navir averiabar itir nɨghnɨzir mogomeba tuisɨghamin dughiam, gumazamizir kabar nɨghnɨzibara arazir kurar me amiziba bagh men araziba tuisɨgham. God gumazamizibar araziba bagh me tuisɨghamin ingangarim isava, Krais Iesusɨn dafarim gatɨ.
